description: Single source of truth for all global constants, limits, and forbidden technologies across the AXIS OS. All modules must reference this file instead of hardcoding values.

performance_budgets.comment: Core Web Vitals and performance metrics based on the OMEGA audit.

LCP_ms.description: Largest Contentful Paint (in milliseconds). Target for 75th percentile.

INP_ms.description: Interaction to Next Paint (in milliseconds). Target for 75th percentile.

main_thread_blocking_ms.description: Maximum total main-thread blocking time during page load.

js_bundle_size_kb.description: Initial JavaScript bundle size limit in kilobytes.

css_bundle_size_kb.description: Initial CSS bundle size limit in kilobytes.

lighthouse_performance_score_min.description: Minimum acceptable Lighthouse performance score for CI/CD checks.

forbidden_tech_stack: Bootstrap.js (use native CSS or Headless UI components)
